Eric has added some marker sets for Mykiss into the flow in order
to get one of Jeff Rodzen's marker sets in as as example.  

To run this, Eric took the `SampleSheet_FRH_Steelhead_GTseq_110720.csv`
and added `MYK_RODZEN` to very sample row in the Description column, and
renamed the result to SampleSheet.csv`.
